name: Disc Golf Tourney
description:
This disc golf game was inspired by games such as Sports Champions (PS3). Take on the excitement of disc golf in this short course in the Pacific Northwest. Can you make it in or under par? This arcade-style game is sure to be a blast!

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: Hold down to propel disc

Q & E: Swap disc  Coming Soon!

Future Updates?

- More Courses

- Expanded Aiming (up and down)

- More Discs
